source: Good love makes you see the whole world from one person while bad love makes you abandon the whole world for one person.
result: 善良的爱让你从一个人身上看到整个世界 而邪恶的爱却让你为了一个人而抛弃整个世界

source: If you really want to dream come true, first woke up from a dream.
result: 如果你真的想梦想成真, 第一次从梦中醒来。

source: You are deceiving yourself if you still believe that she loves you.
result: 如果你还相信她爱你,你就是在欺骗自己

source: worst thing in life is not losing the one we love, but losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much.
result: 生命中最糟糕的事情不是失去我们所爱的人 而是失去自己 在爱一个人的进程中

source: Life usually goes in this ways. To you the once most important thing will finally become nothing. To treasure what you have is actually the beginning to own everything.
result: 生命通常以这种方式发展。对于你来说,最重要的一件事最终会变成一无所有。珍藏你拥有的东西实际上就是拥有一切的开始。

source: So gorgeous appearance, but only you false hide.
result: 外表美极了,但只有你虚伪地躲藏起来

source: people choose to leave not because of selfish reasons but they just know that things will get worse if they stay.
result: 人们选择离开不是因为自私的原因,而是因为他们知道,如果留下来,情况会更糟。

source: To love one who has and gives you positive energy.
result: 爱一个人谁有 并给了你积极的能量。

source: If you choose a conservative line, can achieve the goal of a narrow
result: 如果选择保守线,可以实现狭义目标。

source: are a lot of people who call you by your name, but only one who makes it sound special.
result: 很多人都用你的名字称呼你 但只有一个人能让你听起来很特别

source: YesThe only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday
result: 是的,你唯一应该尝试的人 比昨天的你更好

source: The most amazing things in life tend to happen right at the moment you are about to give up hope.
result: 生命中最奇妙的事情 发生在你即将放弃希望的时候

source: When you stop chasing the wrong things it means that you give the right things chance to catch you.
result: 当你停止追错东西时 意味着你给正确的东西机会抓住你

source: The theme of life is to remain joyful in the face of complexity.
result: 生命的主题是 面对复杂情况 保持快乐

source: Never give up on your dreams before they become a reality.
result: 在梦想变成现实之前 千万不要放弃梦想

source: lose hope. You never know what tomorrow will bring
result: 你永远不知道明天会带来什么

source: I never like to let others see my tears, I would rather let people think I am happy too heartless, but also do not want to seem poor wronged.
result: 我从不想让别人看到我的眼泪, 我宁愿让人们觉得我太冷酷无情地快乐,

source: The  only  thing  you  can  do  when  you  no  longer  have  something  is  not  to  forget.
result: 当你不再有东西的时候 你唯一能做的 就是不要忘记

source: One day that guy walks into you life and you will understand that true love is worth waiting
result: 有一天 那个人走进你的生活 你会明白真爱值得等待

source: The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time.
result: 坏记忆的优点是,一个人第一次享受了数倍相同的好东西。

source: Do not know since when, I have become even oneself all feel strange.
result: 我从什么时候开始就不知道了 我甚至都觉得奇怪了

source: .In this world, only those men who really feel happy can give women happiness
result: 在这个世界上,只有那些真正感到快乐的男人 才能给女人带来幸福

source: Though it was a tiring job, we felt it an honor to serve the disabled friends from all over the world.
result: 尽管这是一项累赘的工作, 我们感到很荣幸能为世界各地的残疾人朋友服务。

source: RepostThe best fighters in the world are people with nothing to lose.
result: 世界上最优秀的战士是无损无损的人

source: It is not he does not love you.It is just not in the way you want.
result: 不是他不爱你 只是不如你所愿

source: Some people say seeing is believing, but what you see can also cheat you. What matters is not what you see, but whether you can see the truth behind the appearance.
result: 有人说:见是信,而你所见的,却能欺骗你。重要的不在于你所见的,在于你看不见外表背后的真理。

source: The world is so big we meet, the world is so small that we missed.
result: 我们相遇的世界是如此之大,世界如此之小,以至于我们错过了。

source: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
result: 未来始于今天,而不是明天。

source: just need someone to talk to.
result: 只是需要有人 谈谈。

source: People will forget what you said. People will forget what you did. But people will never forget how you made them feel.
result: 人们会忘记你说的话,人们会忘记你的行为,但人们不会忘记你是怎样使他们感觉的。

source: A silent hug means a thousand words to the unhappy heart.
result: 沉默的拥抱对不快乐的心来说 意味着千言万语

source: strong chocolate, just like the taste of love to be the first tastes good.
result: 坚固的巧克力,就像爱的味道 成为第一个味道好。

source: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare, it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
result: 并不是因为我们不敢面对困难,而是因为我们不敢面对困难。

source: new stepNo matter what have happened and whether you are ready or not,every next moment is gonna be a brand new start.
result: 无论发生什么 无论你是否准备好 下一刻都会是全新的开始

source: Better to struggle in sweat for today than to repent with tears for yesterday.
result: 今天的汗流总比昨天的流泪忏悔要好。

source: Finally,people with you,often you can not think of.
result: 最后,人们与你在一起, 常常你无法想象。

source: The best way to make someone strong is to have someone who needs protection.
result: 使强者坚强的最好办法是 找一个需要保护的人

source: I think that i am an illiterate. .
result: 我觉得我是一个文盲..

source: one minute you can change your attitude and in that minute you can change your entire day.
result: 一分钟之内你可以改变你的态度 在那一分钟里你可以改变一整天

source: Too dazzling city is not suitable for seeing stars, like your heart is not suitable for talking to settle.
result: 城市太耀眼 不适合看星星 就像你的心脏不适合说话 解决。

source: It takes only a minute to get a crush on someone,an hour to like someone,and a day to love someone,but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.
result: 只要一分钟就能迷上某个人 喜欢一个人一个小时 爱一个人一天 但忘记一个人需要一辈子

source: exactlyEnjoy the small things in life ,for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
result: 完全享受生活中的小东西, 有一天你可能会回首过去, 并意识到它们是大事情。

source: On the keyboard of life always keep one finger on the escape key.
result: 生命的键盘上 总是用一根手指指着逃生钥匙

source: When we first met, I had no idea that you would be so important to me.
result: 当我们第一次见面时,我不知道你会对我这么重要

source: Learn to appreciate what you have, before time forces you to appreciate what you had.
result: 学会欣赏你拥有的东西 在时间迫使你欣赏拥有的东西之前

source: In life and work, we will meet with insurmountable difficulties. Occasionally we do feel helpless and fall in desperate situation. In this case, to be or not to be depends on whether we have enough courage to struggle.
result: 在生活和工作方面,我们将遇到无法克服的困难,有时我们感到无助,陷入绝望境地,在这种情况下,是否取决于我们是否有足够的勇气来斗争。

source: We should cherish our everlasting friendship
result: 我们应该珍惜我们永恒的友谊

source: That a smile is an inexpensive way to improve your looks.
result: 微笑是改善你长相的廉价方法

source: liking someone is your fate
result: 喜欢一个人是你的命

source: Can find their own mistakes is wisdom, to correct its mistakes is brave
result: 能够发现他们自己的错误就是智慧 能够纠正自己的错误是勇敢的

source: We all live in the past. We take a minute to know someone, one hour tolike someone, and one day to love someone, but the whole life to forget someone
result: 我们都活在过去。我们花了一分钟的时间认识一个人, 一个小时喜欢一个人, 一天爱一个人, 但整个人生忘记一个人。

source: Thanked you to come , was very regrettable you to get out of the way .
result: 感谢您前来, 非常遗憾你走出了道路。

source: Sometimes, the simplest advice that you give to others is the hardest thing for you to follow.
result: 有时候,你给别人的 最简单的建议 对你来说是最难遵循的

source: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
result: 如果我知道什么是爱 那是因为你

source: The youth, the scenery along the way again also is just a paper elegance.
result: 年轻人, 一路的风景 也只是纸质优雅。

source: I need is you needing me.
result: 我需要的是你需要我。

source: just a sunflower ,waiting for my only sunshine
result: 只是向日向向日葵 等待我唯一的阳光

source: The sooner you treat your son as as man, the sooner he will be one.
result: 你越快把你儿子当男人看待 他就越早成为男人

source: hard ,stay cheerful ,and let love take care of the rest .
result: 保持快乐,让爱 照顾其余的。

source: Those who could hurt you the most are the ones that you love the most.
result: 最能伤害你的人 就是你最爱的人

source: The best love in the world is to let someone you love find his love.
result: 世上最好的爱 就是让你爱的人找到爱

source: Only when our eyes have been washed by tears, can we have a broader field of vision
result: 只有当我们的眼睛被泪泪洗眼时,我们才能有更广泛的视野领域

source: All you need is love, love is all you need.
result: 你只需要爱 爱就是你所需要的

source: You are not born a winner, nor a loser. You are what you make yourself be.
result: 你生来不是赢家,也不是输家。你就是你自己。

source: That man is the richest whose pleasure are the cheapest.
result: 那个男人最富有 最便宜的就是他的快乐

source: Life has to have cracks in it so that the sun can shine through.
result: 生命必须有裂缝才能让阳光照亮

source: try to force someone to stay in your life. If they want to go, let them go.
result: 强迫别人留在你的生活里 如果他们想走,就放他们走

source: Silence is the sign of growth, while the sign of maturity is how to be silent.
result: 沉默是增长的标志,而成熟的标志就是如何沉默。

source: Give your whole life to one man and one thing
result: 将你一生奉献给一个男人 还有一件事

source: Do not let yourself live like a joke.
result: 不要让自己像笑话一样生活。

source: There is nothing more important than friendships that endure, especially in a world that insists on changing.
result: 没有什么比长期维持的友谊更重要的了,特别是在一个坚持改变的世界中。

source: Everything is going to be alright, maybe not today, but eventually.
result: 一切都会好起来的 也许今天不会 但最终会好起来的

source: My favorite scenes in the show always have to do with emotional arcs within the characters.
result: 我在节目中最喜欢的场景 总是和角色中的情绪弧有关

source: RepostI love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
result: 不是因为你是谁 而是因为我和你在一起时的我是谁

source: Everybody needs just a little love, lots of hope and unshakable faith
result: 每个人都需要一点爱 充满希望和坚定的信念

source: It is not where you come from that counts, it is where you are going..
result: 这不是你从何而来 而是你要去何方

source: You will find happiness when you adopt positive thinking into your daily routine and make it an important part of your world.
result: 当你在日常生活中采取积极思维, 并使它成为你世界的一个重要部分时, 你会发现幸福。

source: When you have to start compromising yourself and your morals for the people around you, its probably time to change the people around you.
result: 当你必须开始为周围的人 牺牲你自己和道德的时候, 它很可能是改变你周围的人的时候。

source: No matter how hard it is, just keep going because you only fail when you give up.
result: 无论有多难,只要继续前进 因为你只有在放弃的时候才会失败

source: I like the dreams of the future than the history of the past.
result: 我喜欢未来的梦想 而不是过去的历史

source: Distance is not terrible, terrible is farther and farther.
result: 距离并不可怕,距离越来越远。

source: matter how bad yesterday was, it should not impact the present and the future.
result: 无论昨天有多糟糕,它不应该影响现在和未来。

source: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is the only choice you have.
result: 你永远不知道你有多坚强 直到你只有坚强才能选择

source: forever friend holds your hand and tells you that everything is going to be okay.
result: 永远的朋友握着你的手 告诉你一切都会好起来的

source: Treat yourself well. Live for what tomorrow has to offer, not for what yesterday took away.
result: 好好对待自己 活在明天能提供的东西上 而不是昨天夺走的东西上

source: you have to stop thinking too much and just go where your heart takes you
result: 别再想太多,去你心所向之处

source: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
result: 让你梦想成真的最佳方式 就是醒来

source: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
result: 生命的真正意义是植树,在树荫下,你并不期望坐在树荫下。

source: Wake up from a dream, the dream might come true.
result: 从梦中醒来 梦就会成真

source: i have just one person.In a casual moment, only to find that, in fact, I have just one person.
result: 我只有一个人, 暂时的, 只是为了发现,事实上,我只有一个人。

source: He who smiles in a crisis has found someone to blame.
result: 在危机中微笑的人 已经找了人来怪罪

source: You may doubt others, but never yourself.
result: 你可能会怀疑别人 但永远不要怀疑自己

source: Life is change. Sometimes pain, sometimes wonderful. But most of the time, both.
result: 生命是变化,有时是痛苦,有时是美妙的 但大部分时候都是

source: It is not our abilities that show us who we truly are, it is our choices.
result: 不是我们的能力告诉我们我们的真实身份,而是我们的选择。

source: To the world you are one person, but to one person you are the world.
result: 对世界来说,你是一个人, 但对一个人来说,你就是世界。

source: Friends are the family we choose to have
result: 朋友是我们所选择的家庭

source: You make the choice, and this is your price.
result: 你做出选择,这是你的代价。

source: I wonder how many people Ive looked at all my life and never seen.
result: 我想知道有多少人,我看着 我一生,从未见过。

source: Never say goodbye to love, because I dont want to be just a memory.
result: 永远不要对爱说再见, 因为我不想只是一个回忆。

source: You are merely a little part of my time in earth, a little understanding of my physical being. You have only, a little piece of me.
result: 你只是我地球上时间的一部分, 了解我的身体。你只有我的一部分。

source: Upgrade completed. A new chapter begins. Looking forward to staring at the FUCKING red dirt for the rest of my life.
result: 升级完成,新的一章开始了 期待我下半辈子都盯着那该死的红土看

source: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
result: 成功就是喜欢自己 喜欢自己的工作 喜欢自己的工作 喜欢自己的方式

source: No one can change a person,but someone can be a reason for that person to change.
result: 没有人可以改变一个人,但有人可以成为这个人改变的理由。

source: It makes sense.The first person that you think of in the morning and the last person you think of at night is either the cause of your happiness or the cause of your pain.
result: 这是有道理的。 第一个人,你想到的早晨 和最后一个人,你想到的晚上 要么是你幸福的原因 要么是你痛苦的原因。

source: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
result: 没有人可以回去重新开始,但任何人都可以从今天开始,作出新的结局。

source: Many people start a career with a dream, then get busy forgetting it.
result: 许多人以梦想开始职业生涯,然后忙着忘记它。

source: Except for you.Nobody knows what you want except for you.
result: 除了你 没人知道你想要什么 除了你

source: I want to wake up where you are.
result: 我想醒来 在那里你在哪里。

source: I feel stupid and contagious
result: 我感觉自己愚蠢又传染

source: Hard things are put in our way , not to stop us , but to call out our courage and strength.
result: 困难的事物被置于我们的方式, 不是阻止我们, 而是号召我们的勇气和力量。

source: In order to discover new lands, one must be willing to lose sight of the shore for a very long time.
result: 为了发现新的土地,人们必须愿意长期忽视海岸。

source: When someone walk out your life, let them. They are just making more room for someone else better to walk in.
result: 当有人离开你的生活时,就放他们走,他们只是让别人有更大的空间,让别人走进去。

source: The high challengeI have never in my life felt more beautiful than when I have stood my tallest.
result: 我这辈子从未感到过比当时我站得最高时 更美丽的挑战

source: The value of life lies not in the length of days, but in the use we make of them.
result: 生命的价值不在于天数的长度,而在于我们如何利用它们。

source: The world is so big, and life is so short. We need to do as much as possible to live our lives the way we want to.
result: 世界如此之大,生命如此短暂。 我们需要尽最大的努力来过我们想要的生活。

source: we are one family,stepping into the darkness together.We are a nation of many religions,but I believe these words reflect the spirit of all our faiths.
result: 我们是一家人,一起踏入黑暗中,我们是一个有许多宗教的国家,但我相信这些话反映了我们所有信仰的精神。

source: things are very few in this world.That is the reason there is just one you.
result: 世界上的事物是很少的。 这就是为什么只有一个你。

source: In fact the set patterns of Hollywood movies are all the same.
result: 事实上好莱坞电影的固定模式 都是一样的。

source: Regardless of what the obstacles may appear in my life, I will run my race, doing my best.
result: 无论人生中遇到什么障碍 我都会尽我最大的努力去赛跑

source: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal. Not to people or things.
result: 如果你想过幸福的生活, 把它与目标联系在一起, 而不是与人或事物。

source: That picture was taken before training and I can only say that the smiles were gone by the time training was over.
result: 那张照片是在训练前拍的,我只能说,训练结束时微笑已经消失。

source: All or nothing, now or never
result: 要么全部,要么什么都没有,要么现在,要么永远,要么永远

source: Nobody could ever replace you...
result: 没有人能取代你...

source: Sad useless, let oneself live your life is the most important. Love is beautiful, but is not the life complete.
result: 可悲的无用,让自己过你自己的生活是最重要的。爱是美丽的,但不是完整的。

source: A righteous person is delivered out of trouble, and the wicked takes his place.
result: 正义的人,得免于忧患,恶人得替他辩护。

source: formation of a new government
result: 组成新政府

source: Love is a lamp, while friendship is the shadow. When the lamp is off,you will find the shadow everywhere. Friend is who can give you strength at last.
result: 爱 是 灯 、 友谊 是 阴影. 当 灯 熄灭 时 、 你 必 到处 找到 影子. 朋友 是 能 给 你 力量 的 人

source: We say we love flowers, yet we pluck them. We say we love trees, yet we cut them down. And people still wonder why some are afraid when told they are loved.
result: 我们说:我们爱花,我们却摘花;我们说:我们爱树,我们却砍树。人们仍然在想:为什么有人告诉他们自己被爱的时候会害怕呢?

source: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
result: 爱不在于互相凝视,而在于向着同一方向向外看。

source: you put somebody in their place, put yourself in their place.
result: 你让别人代替他们 让你自己代替他们

source: Explanation is unnecessary, because people know you do not need it.
result: 解释是不必要的,因为人们知道你不需要解释。

source: Owls are the only birds that can see the colour blue
result: 猫头鹰是唯一能看到蓝色颜色的鸟

source: During the depression, millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.
result: 在萧条期间,数百万失业者在街上流浪。

source: Presence, by its very nature accepts, allows, and includes. If you are involved in judgment, you cannot be present, for the simple reason that in Presence, there is no judgment.
result: 存在本身的性质是接受、允许和包含的。如果你参与判决,你就不能在场,原因很简单,因为存在是没有判断的。

source: The mighty desert is burning for the love of a blade of grass who  　　 shakes her head and laughs and flies away.
result: 强大的沙漠正在燃烧 爱一刀草的爱, 谁摇晃她的头,笑笑和飞走。

source: Climate change could lead to crops from the banana family becoming a critical food source for millions of people, a new report says.
result: 新报告指出,气候变化可能导致香蕉家族的作物成为数百万人的重要食物来源。

source: I have a crush on you.
result: 我爱上你了

source: I endure cry, comedy is always very easy to ending
result: 我忍受着哭泣 喜剧总是很容易结束

source: I would rather be a mistake maker than miss you.
result: 我宁愿做一个错误的制造者 也不愿想念你

source: The smell of baking bread wafted down the hallway.
result: 走廊下面有烤面包的味道

source: When your mood is not good, go out for a walk. Do not let your bad mood bring confusion into the world or anxiety into your heart.
result: 当你的心情不好的时候,就出去走走,不要让你的坏心情给世界带来混乱或焦虑。

source: Today does not walk, will have to run tomorrow.

result: 注射肌肉细胞会增强膀胱周围现有肌肉的强度,减轻症状,减少出现尴尬泄漏的可能性

result: 人生就像一辆过山车。你可以在每次撞车时喊叫,或者举起手来享受旅程。

source: When your mother or father is calling, Do not be slow to respond. When my parents call me, I will answer them right away.
result: 当你们的父母呼唤你们的时候,你们不要反应迟缓,当父母召唤我的时候,我立刻回答他们。

result: 我的每一条伤疤 都使我成为了真正的自己

source: A man void of understanding strikes hands, and becomes collateral in the presence of his neighbor.
result: 无知的人会手握手 当着邻居的面成为抵押品

source: It takes a strong person to deal with tough times and difficult choices. But you are a strong person.
result: 面对艰难的时代和艰难的选择需要坚强的人。但你是一个坚强的人。

source: A lot of things can not control, even lonely again lonely still have to go. Not allowed to stop and not go back.
result: 很多事情都无法控制,即使再次孤单,孤单也不得不离开。不能停下来,不能回去。

source: Sleep when tired and smile when awake.
result: 疲倦地睡觉,醒来时微笑。

source: at any time can become difficult or easy. It all depends upon how one adjusts oneself to life.
result: 任何时候都可能变得困难或容易,这都取决于一个人如何适应生活。

source: be just as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own
result: 就像你对自己一样热切地关心别人的成功

source: This bowl is not being used to serve food where it is needed in the cafeteria.
result: 这个碗不用于食堂需要的食物。

source: Not thought to give up, but always there is no way to do so.
result: 不想放弃,但总是没有办法放弃。

source: Where there is love there is pain.
result: 哪里有爱,哪里有痛苦。

source: Get in the back seat and take a nap while I drive.
result: 坐在后座,我开车时打个盹

source: As long as we have memories, yesterday remains. As long as we have hope, tomorrow waits. As long as we have love, today is beautiful.
result: 只要我们有记忆,昨天就会留下。只要我们有希望,明天就会等待。只要我们有爱,今天就很美。

source: We will have a meeting scheduled as noted below...
result: 我们将安排如下的会议:

source: Clean, noble, love, freedom, hearty and happy forever, you are my lovely Cosmos.
result: 纯洁 高尚 爱 自由 热情 幸福 永远幸福 你是我的可爱的宇宙

source: i will always wait u
result: 我将永远等待 u

source: A drowning man will catch at a straw.
result: 溺水的人会被吸管抓获

source: love speaks to you, believe in him, though his voice may shatter your dreams as the north wind lays waste the garden.
result: 爱对你说,相信他,虽然他的声音 可能打破你的梦想 北风浪费花园。

source: Life is sad at times, but it is up to you to make your own life happy.
result: 生活有时是悲伤的,但你应该让自己的生活快乐。

source: Love is just a word, but you bring it definition.
result: 爱只是一个词, 但你把它的定义。

source: A merry companion is a waggon in the way
result: 快乐的伴侣,是一条阻路的漫步,

source: Love makes man grow up or sink down.
result: 爱能让男人成长或沉沦

source: If there is anything that a man can do well ,I say let him do it .Give him a chance
result: 如果一个人有什么能做得好的话,我说让他做吧。给他一个机会

source: good book is the best of friend, the same today and forever.
result: 好书是最好的朋友, 同样的今天和永远。

source: Prices of some rare earth metals have doubled in just three weeks amid heavy stockpiling in China that has raised fears over global supplies.
result: 一些稀土金属的价格仅仅在三个星期内就翻了一番,因为中国储存量严重,引起对全球供应的担忧。

source: Dear,I lose my temper at you it is because you are getting closer to me.
result: 亲爱的 我对你发脾气 是因为你越来越接近我了

source: We like to get a policy for total loss only for these goods.
result: 我们只希望为这些货物 订出一份全损保险单

source: Time heals all wounds.
result: 时间可以治愈所有伤口。

source: The good or ill of man lies within his own will.
result: 人的善恶是属于自己的意志的。

source: The ship of the Theseus.
result: 特修斯号的船

source: It is always light at the end of the tunnel.
result: 隧道尽头总是明亮的

source: Can find their own mistakes is wisdom, to correct its mistakes is brave
result: 能够发现他们自己的错误就是智慧 能够纠正自己的错误是勇敢的
